thuweets.content: Assessing computer science subjects with a paper-based exam is the most unfair thing. How can the complexities of computer science be expressed on a paper? Due to this, the deserving, skilled students are devoided of their Grades.

Pre-defined web-stacks are useless; Every application made in the worlds is unique in itself and limiting the development to a few tools leads to unefficient system design. But I guess web is a convoluted place;
